entry.title: Thursday: Light snow and blowing snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow and blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
